text: Erie BayHawks may refer to: *Erie BayHawks (2008–2017) – basketball team in the NBA Development League that relocated as the Lakeland Magic *Erie BayHawks (2017–2019) – basketball team in the NBA G League that relocated as the College Park Skyhawks *Erie BayHawks (2019–) – basketball team in the NBA G League that plans to move to Birmingham, Alabama
title: Erie BayHawks
